thread.title: Overlooked Edmonton stepping up
thread.title_full: Overlooked Edmonton stepping up - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Spud Hilton
title: Overlooked Edmonton stepping up
text:
Photo: Spud Hilton Kayakers paddle under a light-rail and pedestrian bridge that stretches over the North Saskatchewan River in Edmonton. The River Valley on either side is mostly protected green space and parks, including hiking and biking paths. Kayakers paddle under a light-rail and pedestrian bridge that...
No doubt there are cities where it’s easier to transition from urban jungle to, well, just plain jungle, but I couldn’t think of one.
